anime.description: In the United States of Antarctica, penguins have lives just like humans; they even have their own Congress. Members of "Congress penguins" discuss and debate over various funny issues all day long, with few meaningful results or resolutions. Source: ANN

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: 限りなくBカップに近いAカップだったら... 正直にAカップと言う派? 見栄を張ってBカップと言う派?
Episode 4
Kagarinaku B Cup ni Chikai A Cup Dattara... Shoujiki ni A Cup to Iu Ha? Mie o Hatte B Cup to Iu Ha?
靴を履いた後に忘れ物に気づいたら... 靴を脱いで取りに行く派? 靴を履いたまま頑張る派?
Episode 3
Kutsu o Haita Ato ni Wasuremono ni Kizuitara... Kutsu o Nuide Tori ni Iku Ha? Kutsu o Haita Mama Ganbaru Ha?
雑誌を読んでいてたまたまエッチなページに差し掛かった時, 後ろに他人がいたら... 飛ばして読む派? 堂々と読む派?
Episode 2
Zasshi o Yondeite Tamatama Ecchi na Page ni Sashikakatta Toki, Ushiro ni Tanin ga Itara... Tobashite Yomu Ha? Doudou to Yomu Ha?
友達からお金を返してほしい時... 自分から返してと言う派? 待つ派?
Episode 1
Tomodachi kara Okane o Kaeshite Hoshii Toki... Jibun kara Kaeshite to Iu Ha? Matsu Ha?
Ending
男女の友情って本当に成立しないの!?
Episode 8
Danjo no Yuujoutte Hontou ni Seiritsu Shinai no!?
飲み会での「無礼講」ってどこまでがセーフなの!?
Episode 7
Nomikai de no "Bureikou" tte Doko made ga Safe na no!?
自分が面白くないと思っている映画を友達が絶賛し始めたとき... 話を合わせる派? 正直な感想を言う派?
Episode 6
Jibun ga Omoshirokunai to Omotte Iru Eiga o Tomodachi ga Zessan Shihajimeta Toki... Hanashi o Awaseru Ha? Shoujiki na Kansou o Iu Ha?
美容室に行く前に... 髪を洗う派? 美容室で洗ってもらうから洗わない派?
Episode 5
Biyoushitsu ni Iku Mae ni... Kami o Arau Ha? Biyoushitsu de Aratte Morau kara Arawanai Ha?
あなたはいくつ該当する?「大阪人度チェック」
Episode 12
Anata wa Ikutsu Gaitou Suru? "Osaka Jindo Check"
自転車に乗っている時に前に人がいたら... チャリンチャリン鳴らす派? それともブレーキの軋む音で気づかせる派?
Episode 11
Jitensha ni Notte Iru Toki ni Mae ni Hito ga Itara... Charincharin Narasu Ha? Soretomo Break no Sashimu Oto de Kizukaseru Ha?
激論! 「モテる男ってどんな男?」ペン議員夜まで生討論会
Episode 10
Gekiron! "Moteru Otokotte Donna Otoko?" Pengiin Yoru made Nama Touronkai
10分くらい遅刻しそうな時... 「あと5分で着く」と短めに言う派? 念のため「あと15分で着く」と長めに言う派?
Episode 9
10 Pun Kurai Chikoku Shisou na Toki... "Ato 5 Fun de Tsuku" to Mijikame ni Iu Ha? Nen no Tame "At 15 Fun de Tsuku" to Nagame ni Iu Ha?
パンチラして特に恥ずかしいのは... 超派手な攻めパンツ派? ダサくて古いヨレヨレパンツ派?
Episode 13
Panchira Shite Toku ni Hazukashii no wa... Chou Hade na Seme Pantsu Ha? Dasakute Furui Yoreyore Pantsu Ha?
